department: DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WORKS AND GOVERNMENT SERVICES
short_summary: Provide miscellaneous concrete work, concrete restoration and epoxy injection work
description: STATEMENT OF WORK: Provide the furnishing of all labour, material, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision required to perform miscellaneous concrete work, concrete restoration and epoxy injection work to concrete and masonry surfaces, for interior and exterior of buildings, grounds and works of CFB Halifax.
